name: Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware存在未明漏洞
product: ["Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=13.2.1\uff0c<13.2.7", "Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=13.4.1\uff0c<13.4.4", "Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware >=13.5.1\uff0c<13.5.3"]
description: RTU500是日本日立制作所（Hitachi）公司的一系列工控组件，主要用于工业控制系统。Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware存在安全漏洞，攻击者可利用漏洞绕过安全更新。
solution:
厂商已发布补丁修复漏洞，请广大用户及时下载更新：
https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-26177
patch: Hitachi Energy RTU500 series CMU Firmware存在未明漏洞的补丁
